name: WiFiManager_NINA_Lite
keywords: wifi, wi-fi, MutiWiFi, WiFiNINA, U-Blox, W101, W102, shield, Mega, Teensy, SAM DUE, SAMD, STM32, nRF52, Credentials, Manager
description: Library to configure MultiWiFi/Credentials at runtime for AVR Mega, Teensy, SAM DUE, SAMD, STM32nRF52, etc. boards running U-Blox WiFiNINA modules/shields. You can also specify DHCP HostName, static AP and STA IP. Use much less memory compared to full-fledge WiFiManager. Config Portal will be auto-adjusted to match the number of dynamic custom parameters. Credentials are saved in EEPROM, FlashStorage or DueFlashStorage.
